title: "Meta and Microsoft say they will buy AMD's new AI chip as an alternative to Nvidia"
excerpt: "If AMD's latest high-end chip, MI300X, is good enough and inexpensive enough for the technology companies and cloud service providers building and serving AI models when it starts shipping early next year, it could lower costs for developing AI models."
